title: This whole time I thought turrets were getting buffed
body: They are actually shit lol like the plating kinda works doesn't feel like its really doing as much as I thought it would though but after the plating turrets might as well be super minions. It doesn't feel really any different it feels worse some how.

replies.body: Seems kind of odd to me that plating is meant to stave off the closure of lane phase BUT they are also a driver to get people to go aggro on the turrets and claim the gold bounty of the plating before they evaporate and take their gold with them.

> [{quoted}](name=Strawberrycocoa,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=auvobI5N,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-20T23:18:49.980+0000)
>
> Seems kind of odd to me that plating is meant to stave off the closure of lane phase BUT they are also a driver to get people to go aggro on the turrets and claim the gold bounty of the plating before they evaporate and take their gold with them.

Risk vs Reward. Especially for melee champs they will be hitting the turret for extra gold and then..... can be caught out easily since the turrets will be stronger.
Riot really wants the games to end in 15-20mins.
Seems like after 14 mins and you lose plating the first turret dies faster than what it did before.
It 100% does actually become easier since it loses all defense iirc.
